children: ti ‘‘sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca, chandapārisuddhiutukkhānaṃ, bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo, pātimokkhaṃ therabhāroti vuccatī’’ti imaṃ dasavidhaṃ therabhāraṃ navako hutvā
therena anajjhiṭṭho karonto anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati nāma.
ti thero samāno tameva dasavidhaṃ bhāraṃ attanā vā akaronto paraṃ vā asamādapento āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati nāma. Dutiyasuttepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
innerText: 99. Pañcamassa paṭhame anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahatīti ‘‘sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca, chandapārisuddhiutukkhānaṃ, bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo, pātimokkhaṃ therabhāroti vuccatī’’ti imaṃ dasavidhaṃ therabhāraṃ navako hutvā therena anajjhiṭṭho karonto anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati nāma. Āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahatīti thero samāno tameva dasavidhaṃ bhāraṃ attanā vā akaronto paraṃ vā asamādapento āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati nāma. Dutiyasuttepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.

children: ti kumbhīlamaṃsabiḷāramaṃsādimhi kappiye ‘‘akappiyaṃ ida’’nti evaṃsaññī. Catutthaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
innerText: 101. Tatiye akappiye kappiyasaññīti akappiye sīhamaṃsādimhi ‘‘kappiyaṃ ida’’nti evaṃsaññī. Kappiye akappiyasaññīti kumbhīlamaṃsabiḷāramaṃsādimhi kappiye ‘‘akappiyaṃ ida’’nti evaṃsaññī. Catutthaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

children: ti āpucchitvā bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovantassa, pattaṃ pacantassa, kese chindantassa, gāmaṃ pavisantassātiādīsu anāpatti, tattha ‘‘āpatti aya’’nti evaṃsaññī.
ti tesaññeva vatthūnaṃ anāpucchākaraṇe āpatti, tattha ‘‘anāpattī’’ti evaṃsaññī. Chaṭṭhepi
innerText: 103. Pañcame anāpattiyā āpattisaññīti āpucchitvā bhaṇḍakaṃ dhovantassa, pattaṃ pacantassa, kese chindantassa, gāmaṃ pavisantassātiādīsu anāpatti, tattha ‘‘āpatti aya’’nti evaṃsaññī. Āpattiyā anāpattisaññīti tesaññeva vatthūnaṃ anāpucchākaraṇe āpatti, tattha ‘‘anāpattī’’ti evaṃsaññī. Chaṭṭhepi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Sattamādīni uttānatthāneva.

children: nti saṅghabhogassa apaṭṭhapanaṃ avicāraṇaṃ na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ nāma, taṃ kukkuccāyati.
nti tasseva paṭṭhapanaṃ vicāraṇaṃ, taṃ na kukkuccāyati. Dvādasamādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
innerText: 109. Ekādasame āsavāti kilesā. Na kukkuccāyitabbanti saṅghabhogassa apaṭṭhapanaṃ avicāraṇaṃ na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ nāma, taṃ kukkuccāyati. Kukkuccāyitabbanti tasseva paṭṭhapanaṃ vicāraṇaṃ, taṃ na kukkuccāyati. Dvādasamādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
